doc.title: Headshots
doc.plot: Carlos Rodriguez is probably one of the most talented actors alive, but unfortunately he never got a real chance to prove it. The difficult road of obstacles and politics a foreign actor must go through almost got the best of Carlos. But instead of packing up his bags and heading back home, Carlos decides to take his journey to the next level. As a child in Spain Carlos was taught that rules must be broken when needed and a man must creates his own luck. While casting directors are vanishing daily, and Hollywood is turning into a chaotic reality, Carlos Rodriguez is climbing to the top.
